  • Uses of MeshEntity3 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return MeshEntity3
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.append(Mesh3 mesh)
    Appends a mesh to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.appendAll(Mesh3... app)
    Appends a list of meshes to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.appendAll(Collection<Mesh3> app)
    Appends a collection of meshes to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.consumeTransform()
    Transforms all meshes in this mesh entity by its transform, then resets the entity's transform to the identity.
    static MeshEntity3
    ParserObj.load(BufferedReader in, boolean poolData)
    Creates a mesh entity from a BufferedReader that references a WaveFront .obj file with groups.

    Material data from a .mtl file is not parsed by this function.
    static MeshEntity3
    ParserObj.load(String fileName, boolean poolData)
    Creates a mesh entity from a file name that references a WaveFront .obj file with groups.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.reframe()
    Centers and rescales all curves in the mesh entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions, subtracting the center point, and scaling by the maximum dimension.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.reset()
    Resets the mesh entity to an initial state.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.scaleBy(float scalar)
    Scales the entity by a scalar.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.scaleBy(Vec3 scalar)
    Scales the entity by a non-uniform scalar.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.scaleTo(float scaleNew)
    Scales the entity to a uniform size.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.scaleTo(Vec3 scaleNew)
    Scales the entity to a non-uniform size.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.scaleTo(Vec3 scalar, float step)
    Eases the entity to a scale by a step over time.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.setCoord(int meshIndex, int coordIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
    Sets a coordinate in a mesh.
    MeshEntity3
    MeshEntity3.toOrigin()
    Centers all meshes in the mesh entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions then subtracting the center point.
